name: ClubJACK
0:
”Alexa, ask club jack if jack Thistledown has any promotions.”
”Alexa, ask club jack if I have any offers at Cleveland.”
”Alexa, ask club jack for my offers at Thistledown.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: club jack
Developer Terms of Use
des: This Alexa Skill allows you to retrieve information from your account! Things like your Account Balance and Offers available, just ask Amazon Alexa to "open Club JACK".
